name: Dr. Brandy Schillace

tweet: 8/ Sometimes a treasure hunt turns up only sand. But it was one heck of a journey‚Äîto end up back in the states two years later, and working at a museum with one of the plush manikins, gave me a secret thrill.

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet: 7/ I assume his wife, bereaved and wondering why a headless woman doll was hanging about, got rid of it. But we don‚Äôt know for sure, because the records I needed to find out about his will/property were lost in the Dublin fire.

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet: 6/ I know this because I went to 3 countries looking for it, tracked down leads from Kentucky US to London, Dublin, Rouen. I never found it, and the trail went cold in Dublin when the owner of the last died of fever before establishing a midwifery school.

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet: 5/ He‚Äôd built a whole woman. She wore clothes, stockings, shoes‚Äîand the students claimed you could almost imagine it was a real woman. (Note: it did not have a head.) Three we‚Äôre designed before his death. And not one of them remains. We have detailed descriptions‚Äîno images

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet: 4/ this beauty was built by William Smellie (unfortunately named for the midwifery profession perhaps). His versions were mechanical with contracting uterus and soft flexible skin, hinged joints, and even the fetus had a moving jaw. And it wasn‚Äôt just the important bits‚Äî

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet: 3/ But, you see, Madame du Coudray was a woman teaching women. These were men teaching men (mostly). What they wanted was a super high tech science-y model, suitable to MAN-midwives. Several had been developed. But then there was the Mother Machine.

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet: 2/ In 18th c England, men were taking over the practice often maligning women midwives as incompetent‚Äîthey didn‚Äôt go to school, after all, and man midwives had a 14 week course! (What would women know about birth anyway, right?) they also wanted a model; they knew about Coudray

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet: 1/ Now, this model had supposedly belonged to a student of Madame du Coudray, 18th c French midwife. I‚Äôd seen the originals in Rouen with some of my then-students; they are startling. Plush. Big squishy wombs. And that‚Äôs how she taught midwives‚Äîin France, midwives were women. But

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet: I‚Äôm about to share a strange story: I once curated a portion of the med history museum, using it to follow the history of midwifery, gynecology, and birth generally. The strangest device was a cloth covered pair of legs that opened into a pregnant womb‚Äîwith cloth fetus. #history

I‚Äôm not blaming the rare books librarian by the way. I worked in a place with rare books and librarians are the sane holdouts in this world. But I didn‚Äôt exactly do my scanning with the effervescent joy I‚Äôd started the day with. Persistence (+8 trips up to floor 6) pays off https://t.co/M5zHnYk6CA

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)

16/
While I‚Äôm pondering this, she decides to reboot the machine. And now it works with my USB. I will always remember her words‚Ä¶ ‚Äòsometimes you just need enough despair in the air.‚Äô Followed by: ‚Äòwe have to do this all the time when the USB stops working.‚Äô I‚Äôve been here hours.

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)

15/
‚ÄòI suppose I could ask if it‚Äôs all right to just scan it for you later and email you the PDF.‚Äô 
A scanned PDF. I‚Äôm an email. Which I was assured could not be possible, and so travelled over the Atlantic at my own expense to get. 
‚ÄòWhat?‚Äô Says me from the floor.

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)

14/

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)

It‚Äôs a little known fact that IF you drop a mini SD card, it will promptly vanish into the seventh dimension. We can‚Äôt find it. I‚Äôm on my knees under a scan-machine with my phone light and a ruler‚Äîshe is going about with a tiny dust brush. It‚Äôs NOWHERE.

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace

12/ 
I had trouble getting the package open. The librarian offers help. She has trouble too. Finally I hear the pop of plastic‚Äîand the dink-de-dink-dink that tells me we‚Äôve dropped the SD card.

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)

Okay. I forgot my bag was in the basement. I have a bit of cash. I find one I can afford. I walk back. Everything should work, right? WRONG.

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet:
10/
Ok, don‚Äôt panic‚ÄîI say to myself (why is it so hot in here??) ‚Äòwhat are our options, here.‚Äô Well. It also takes an SD card. Where can I get one? NO ONE KNOWS. It‚Äôs ok though. I saw a market that printed photos on my walk there. I‚Äôll just go back downstairs and walk a mile.

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet:
9/
Because my temperature tends to rise when fight or flight mode hits. Upstairs I go with my card. ‚ÄòPut your USB in.‚Äô I came with one, of course. In it goes. ‚ÄòWhat USB?‚Äô The machine asks. ‚ÄòWe don‚Äôt see one.‚Äô We try two USB. Neither work. No, there is no other scanner. Anywhere.

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet: 8/ The rare books librarian for my university debit card. ‚ÄòUm?‚Äô Oh dear, she says, you don‚Äôt have one. You need to buy a pre-paid one. On the ground floor. So down I go. It takes two tries but at last I find a venting machine. I am still not panicking. But is it hot it here?

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet:
7/
It turns out that yes, I can have a card. She apologizes and says very funny good humored things. We part as friends. I return upstairs to make my digital copy. Oh yes: I have to have it professionally translated so I need a copy. I‚Äôm allowed to make one (but only in person.)

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet:
6/
Now‚Ä¶ I applied for a grant just to cover costs for this trip, to retrieve this one centrally important document. I am not panicking. Yet. But I explain that the rare books librarian is aware I‚Äôm not local. May I please have a card? She doesn‚Äôt know. She makes a phone call.

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)

5/
No problem! Down I go. ‚ÄòHi, here is my online number, I need my official card.‚Äô She asks for my address in Germany. My permanent address. ‚ÄòI don‚Äôt have one; I‚Äôm a traveling scholar from the US.‚Äô Blank look. ‚ÄòYou cannot be given a card, then.‚Äô

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)

I head up to the 6th floor‚Äîtook the stairs. Speak with the rare books librarian on shift; ah yes! We are expecting you. Please give me your member card. I provide my online registration. That, however, is not the same as a member card. ‚ÄòPlease go to ground level and get one.‚Äô

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet:
3/
You usually are assigned a locker. You can bring your phone and PC. Except this library required you to have your own lock. I can buy one on site! Oh. Only with coins. No card or paper cash. I go in search of cash of the coin variety. Done. Lock acquired.
Then it goes wrong.

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace

tweet: And I give the story above as evidence of how biased everything is. I am 5‚Äô9‚Äù and weight about 140; the app suggested I lose 8 pounds. I‚Äôve been 130, before, sure. My hair fell out and I looked skeletal. Generic weight indexes make no sense to individual lives.

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet: Another comment said my assertion that you can be fat, beautiful, sexy, and healthy was contradictory. No, it isn‚Äôt. Don‚Äôt get me started on #BMI and it‚Äôs ludicrous claims. I suffer a condition that keeps me ill-thin, and a so-called health app told me I should lose weight too.

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet: One comment I received said my friend‚Äôs MD was right to ignore PCOS and tell her to lose weight‚Äîbecause (commenter‚Äôs claim) ‚Äòobesity and PCOS are linked.‚Äô No. And while I‚Äôm at it, why take the MD‚Äôs word she needed to lose weight? She is beautiful and healthy. #fatshaming

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet: Anyway. This is why I am exhausted, and it‚Äôs why my focus hasn‚Äôt been great, and it‚Äôs why I‚Äôm writing this thread in my PJs instead of sitting at my desk right now. And that‚Äôs ok, too. I find joy where I can (@peculiarBC is a big part of that). I hope you do, too. #solidarity

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet: And that‚ÄîTHAT‚Äîis #burnout. We‚Äôve given our all in the past few years, and there just doesn‚Äôt seem to be a break in the offing. I‚Äôm not here to bring you down, but to affirm that, yeah, we‚Äôre sick and tired of being sick and tired. We have a right to be. Everything is hard. (7/)

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet: Mostly this is just what it means to be freelance, or even to be in a gig economy. We‚Äôre all there, really. And then you add pandemic, threat of war, chronic illness issues (autoimmune for me), +attempts at work-life balance‚Äîwell. We‚Äôre tired, aren‚Äôt we? Everyone I know is (6/)

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet: What does that mean? Well, I appeared on about 30 podcasts, maybe more (I lost count). I did virtual events, spent a lot of time on social media. I did some TV. And, I needed to work on my next book‚ÄîI wrote a total of 4 book proposals at around 50 pp each. This is standard. (5/)

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet: It amounts to about 20 hours a week (we almost break even, so this is mainly free work‚ÄîLabor of ‚ù§Ô∏è:) I also run the journal, and wrote 23 articles for publication last year at places like @WIRED and @WSJ. And my job in the last year was to sell my book (4/)

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet: The @peculiarBC is now in its second season, we‚Äôve hosted amazing talent, and we‚Äôve built a brilliant platform of wonderful #peculiars. Two shows a month free/by donation, plus podcast, film skits, coordinated with bookstores for signed copies. It‚Äôs just me, aided by Davey. (3/)

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace

tweet: The PBC is an inclusive, safe space for readers of #strange and interesting #nonfiction ‚Äîand a platform for supporting #authors and giving their books a push into new audiences. My own book languished b/c pandemic; I wanted to make a place of support that was also a family (2/)

tweet: But then again, how will people come to know they have been (probably unintentionally) #ableist or offensive if we never say anything? And if I‚Äôm kind, and can explain, it might help in the long run. Yet‚ÄîI do not like this feeling. I am the opposite of antagonistic.

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet: I‚Äôm used to accommodating, not asking for accommodations. I‚Äôm used to apologizing and ‚Äòdoing better‚Äô not correcting, however politely. I never want anyone to be upset; I spend my time trying to build people, to care, to make community. I don‚Äôt aim to chastise, as a rule.

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet: But‚Ä¶ I replied. I probably shouldn‚Äôt have; Twitter is not the best place for such things. I explained that I don‚Äôt prefer being called ‚Äògirl‚Äô and that I no longer try to mask everything about my #autism that might upset other people. I tried to do this kindly. But I feel angst.

tweet: I did something I don‚Äôt normally do this morning. I‚Äôm of two minds about it. I had someone comment on a video of me, and say something both gendered and derogatory (full disclosure, #ActuallyAutistic and yes, I have tics). I normally leave it alone, and just feel upset quietly.

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace

tweet: It‚Äôs a very strange thing to feel free to speak truth about your family and upbringing. I used to temper everything for fear of letting ‚Äòthe family‚Äô down. But I can love & be loved by them‚Äîand still say ‚Äòit was very messed up.‚Äô Drugs. Alcohol. PTSD. Mental health issues. Abuse.

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet: I think it‚Äôs my own cautionary tale; a reminder that as we fight for diversity the point is to hear FROM, not ‚Äòabout‚Äô under-represented groups. To work WITH, not ‚Äòfor‚Äô or ‚Äòinstead of‚Äô‚ÄîTo listen. To let them do the talking and creating. End.

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet: In the dream, I had been proud of the painting as an object. I wanted people to see it because I painted it. But the artist understood better: I should have wanted the painting to be seen because of the women themselves, strong and shining and daring and open 4/

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet: At the unveiling, a white man (a professor I think), asked me what it was for. But then a Black woman artist came up to me and said ‚Äòyes. This is right. But you should not have been able to paint it.‚Äô It should have been painted by the women themselves. 3/

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet: Looked at one way, it seemed brooding and dark; the children looked out toward the waves. Looked at the other way, and the smiling women‚Äîdancing, working, laughing‚Äîwere coming up from the shore with baskets of plenty. The sun was on their backs and bright clothing. 2/

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet: I dreamed I painted an enormous mural. But it changed depending on which side you viewed it from. There were children and women‚Äîsome West African, some aboriginal Australian, some Polynesian, Asia/Pacific or Latino. The colors were so bright, and the ocean lay behind them. 1/

tweet: @deborahbrian It took me till this year just to start asking accommodation for autism; I‚Äôm conditioned to provide, to bear up, to carry. It‚Äôs a lot of re-thinking and therapy to get myself here. That article and others like it ‚Äî huge helps.

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet: @deborahbrian ‚ù§Ô∏èI have a stepped 5 and 10 year plan; we have to go before Mark retires and I lose his insurance (I‚Äôm freelance so‚Ä¶ benefits are a laugh). We‚Äôre looking at all sorts of places!

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet: @deborahbrian I think im the healthiest version of everything I have, which is great! Except I have a lot of things. So mildest ED, mildest heart valve prolapse, mild migraine, mild seizure, (not so mild but well controlled IBS), etc. Im grateful. But also, it leads me to not ask for help.

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet: @deborahbrian I am actively looking to emigrate

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet: @deborahbrian My mother is a barometer‚ÄîI am trying hard to stay healthier longer by addressing things sooner (her health had already dived by 40). It‚Äôs a matter of time. A friend of mine says all humans are really just disabled or pre-disabled. Solidarity my friend!!

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet: @deborahbrian Mine is autoimmune inflammatory too! But yes, largely the original issue seems neurological in nature‚Äîthe wiring is messy. I‚Äôve got it mostly in check but it requires a lot of work‚ÄîI keep ED at bay with near constant exercise and strength training.

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet: @deborahbrian The world of late has not helped. I live in US, and healthcare is a constant worry, too.

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet: @deborahbrian Oh oh‚Äîgotcha! Not that, thankfullly. I just have a fun combo of IBS, ED, migraine, and a neurological condition that turns stress into TLE seizures. (And autism). When I‚Äôm healthy I‚Äôm very healthy. But when one goes off, they all go off in cascade.

tweet: But at the same time, I KNOW that I'm not alone in wishing for a cool club of folks to interact with twice a month and talk books. I mean, who doesn't want that? And it's fun and quirky, it's live, we interact. Also it's #weird. Anyway. Join us? https://t.co/EsXhB4ZwY2

tweet: For instance, we have a live show on Dec 9th for viewers to speak live to #MaryRoach about her new book #Fuzz (and her old books too, I mean, #dead bodies and things). You have to register, but it's hard without paid publicity to get it out there. https://t.co/IPDzMnCSmQ

tweet: The trouble, of course, is that @Twitter is a freeway and tweets are billboards whizzing by. I figure there must be lots of folks who want a Morticia-Addams-Style club of #readers/live chat with #authors. I'm just not sure how best to reach you. #books #BookTwitter https://t.co/D7Io2cyz7m

description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet: A settlers graveyard? This was eastern Ohio, not far from PA border. Did it mark a tragedy? Many things are hard to tell at night, with the dark like a velvet hammer. We left it to collect the dogs and find the way home. We meant to return. But we never could find it by day. /End

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet: These are tombstones. Why are they here? If there were words, they are long gone, effaced by time and elements. It‚Äôs small enough to be a family grouping‚Äîlarge enough to have contained a generation or two. In the woods. Far from roads. Far from houses or towns. And very old 4/

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet: It‚Äôs easy to get lost. It happened rarely to my father, a human compass. But it did happen‚Ä¶ sometimes. We walk through dark branches, and then, in the lamplight we see small stones, all in a row like broken teeth. Roots wrap around them, trees grow through them, but we know: 3/

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet: The works shrinks to the size and shape of your headlamp. You are as coal miners, and the forest is your tunnel, everything outside the circle turns fuzzy and black. I kept my father‚Äôs broad back in the circle, and we walked and walked, following the baying of hounds. 2/

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet: Story time (#spooky). When I was young, I lived in an underground house in abandoned coal land. It sat atop fifty wooded acres in thousands of acres once owned by Peabody coal. Because my father owned coonhounds, I would go out at night with him into the forest 1/

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace

tweet: Social justice: It‚Äôs not mere rhetoric. It‚Äôs not ‚Äòleftist politics.‚Äô Social: relating to all society. Justice: just/fair treatment. Why is this a threat? Rights for everyone doesn‚Äôt mean fewer rights for you. If you‚Äôre against it, you‚Äôre against all that is human and decent.

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet: Are you ‚Äòweird‚Äô? You‚Äôre welcome. An outsider because non-normative? We‚Äôre your people. Made to feel you were strange because of your interests, your fascination for #histsci #peculiar? Join us. Subscriptions are up for S2, starting Jan‚Äîits awesome! https://t.co/P3TPNUZ6Xj 7/

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet: I started @peculiarBC in May. My first guest (and always supporter) was @mary_roach followed by @DrLindseyFitz. The rest followed. Live show, YouTube, podcast. Store! FB group, Twitter, tiktok videos of me being very silly‚Äîand people came. We‚Äôve a place now, a #weird family 6/

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet: There didn‚Äôt seem to be. Why not? Perhaps it wasn‚Äôt marketable enough? Were we not able important? Or was it just that we‚Äôd all got used to accepting the lonely position of outsider? As with other missing representations, you have to be the thing you want to see. 5/

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet: I am an author. A PhD. I‚Äôm a reader, too. I discovered the books of @mary_roach and @deborahblum ‚ÄîI know @DrLindseyFitz and @sam_kean. And I realized there are all sorts of #peculiar folk who love such books too. Wouldn‚Äôt it be grand if there was a #bookclub for us? 4/

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet: I lived in a small (dying) coal town, rural and beautiful but also repressive, socially normative, conservative. I wasn‚Äôt *meant* to sit alone in cemeteries reading about epidemics/vampires. There wasn‚Äôt a place for peculiar kids like me. This sense persisted into adulthood 3/

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet: I read a lot of such books. I read fiction too, mostly #gothic tales, a dash of @StephenKing horror, and quite a lot of #mystery. But most enchanting to me were the long shadows of history‚Äîof true things that seemed magic in their promise, or shocking in their horrors. 2/

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet:
Being a #peculiar #Neurodivergent and #queer lover of #books, a short story. 

Once upon a kid-hood, I found myself alone in a library. I wasn‚Äôt really alone, of course, but as the only 12 year old interested in 14th c bubonic plague‚ÄîI *felt* alone. 1/

Ok friends: recipe

For two coops: 
2 oz gin
1 oz basil syrup (simple syrup,infused with basil)
1/2 punch (and some) orgeat
Juice of two limes and a lemon
A lot of lavender bitters (I use greenbar brand)
One fresh sprig basil to garnish
One dried sprig lavender set on fire

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet: But the point is, sometimes words change meaning depending on who speaks them. A word spoken from power of oppression is not the same as a word spoken among and to comrades. And gender terms are especially in this camp. (But don‚Äôt call us ‚Äòmiss‚Äô or ‚Äòmissy.‚Äô Ever. Bubble bubble).

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet:
and he says ‚Äòno, lovely lady, speak not to such hags.‚Äô He is saying: ‚Äòyou are not of their kind/you don‚Äôt know any better/you are as I‚Äôve decided you are based on looks alone/I will save you from yourself‚Äîalso you owe me‚Äô 
I don‚Äôt know why I went to MacBeth on this‚Ä¶

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet: Then, I went all Shakespeare. Like, imagine you come across a trio of witches toiling and troubling in the woods. They look up at you and say, ‚Äòhey lady!‚Äô It‚Äôs ‚Äòhey witch sister, grab a ladle and give a stir, won‚Äôt you?‚Äô But like assume a roving MacBeth sees you approach them‚Äî

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet: My take: I find I don‚Äôt mind being called lady by women‚Ä¶ and I‚Äôm gender fluid so in general I don‚Äôt care for terms like that. But I think when I hear it from women, it‚Äôs like a term of inclusion and when I hear it from men it‚Äôs like a label of otherness.

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet: More importantly I don‚Äôt give myself a break when stuff gets hard. I‚Äôm trying to be gentle with myself. I don‚Äôt want to always present the un-cracked facade that makes it look easy (and makes me consequently somewhat unapproachable). *This* me is okay too‚Äîthis tired, vexed me. 6/

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet: I wouldn‚Äôt change me. But in my day to day, I‚Äôm doing the work of a writer +the work of translating myself to the surface. For #neurodivergent people, it looks like we‚Äôre meeting half way, but we‚Äôve already come miles to be here at all. I don‚Äôt ask enough for accommodation. 5/

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet: I grew accustomed to making my presentation seamless‚Äîas flawless as possible. It works. But it also means being ‚Äòso put together‚Äô is exactly that: effort has gone into this role. Someone told me that I just seem so at home in myself. I felt like I‚Äôd earned a curtain call. 4/

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet: I am very lucky. I do not need much support (some #Neurodivergent folk need more, some less). I like how I‚Äôm wired‚ÄîI‚Äôm well suited to my chosen career. But it‚Äôs not a superpower (BBC Sherlock having perhaps done more harm than good‚Ä¶) Again: I‚Äôm not a machine. It‚Äôs not easy 3/

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet: Try to tell people that: I‚Äôm not a supercharged engine; I‚Äôm not a machine. They tend to reply by assuring me that I am‚Äîoh, you make it look easy! You‚Äôre so put together! Well yes. That is also part of the work. I have #autism + hyperlexia and I‚Äôm an overachiever at masking. 2/

name: Dr. Brandy Schillace
description: Author, historian, host of @peculiarBC (book club), & Editor of @MedHums_BMJ. Bylines @SciAm @globeandmail @WSJ @wired @Medium. #NB #ActuallyAutistic (she/her)
tweet: I write for a living. I average 2500 words a day. I‚Äôm good at it; I enjoy it. I juggle a major journal‚Äôs daily running, I keep deadlines, I follow research, I promote and run a YouTube show, I promote authors, I run a brand. I‚Äôve been called ‚Äòa machine.‚Äô But I‚Äôm not a machine. 1/
